item.description: Doors open at 8 am. Plan to be at Foxwoods by 8 to reserve seating in the non-smoking area... We'll leave for Breakfast Festival Buffet at 8:30 (Cost $9.95, $8.95 with a wampum card). The games start at 10 am (Cost $25), and we'll be playing them all! Bring your dabbers and lucky charms! We'd love to have a winner from our group!!! RSVP by Saturday noon to reserve your spot! Let us know if you're interested in carpooling and we'll try to set it up.
item.name: Breakfast and Bingo at Foxwoods
